text: Tomás Jones (born 1903, date of death unknown) was an Argentine swimmer. He competed in the men's 4 × 200 metre freestyle relay event at the 1924 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1903 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Argentine male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Argentina Category:Swimmers at the 1924 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Tomás Jones
